cloudwatch_log_group_name.description: CloudWatch log group for task logs

description.constant_value: Allow Renovate task to read its token secret.
Allow EventBridge Scheduler to run the Renovate ECS task.
Security group for Renovate Fargate task (no inbound).

constant_value.description: Allow all egress (HTTPS to git provider, plus AWS endpoints).

description.constant_value: Security group for interface VPC endpoints.

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_image.description: Container image URI for Renovate. Prefer an ECR image URI.

create_vpc_endpoints.description: Whether to create interface/gateway VPC endpoints for ECR/Logs/SecretsManager/S3.

git_platform.description: Git platform for Renovate (e.g., github, gitlab, bitbucket).

renovate_repositories.description: List of repositories for Renovate to process (e.g., ['org/repo']).

renovate_token_secret_arn.description: ARN of an existing Secrets Manager secret containing the Renovate token (plain string). If empty, a new secret is created (without a value).

schedule_expression.description: EventBridge Scheduler expression. Example: rate(1 day) or cron(0 2 * * ? *).

tags.description: Additional tags to apply to resources.
